title: Full Stack Developer with Angular
body:
Company Description

We are an independent technology and management consulting firm dedicated to driving business transformation & innovation for clients on an international level. Our expert solutions focus on Strategy & Change, Information System & Digital, Telecoms, Life Sciences and Engineering. We constantly meet and exceed our 850+ worldwide clients’ expectations – this is made possible by an international team of more than 6,000 people, working together from 80 offices in 55 countries. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential.

Your Role

We have just launched a new challenge for a Full Stack Java Developer in Vienna!


His responsabilities will be the following:

  • Participate in the translation into technical specifications;
  • Participate in the estimation of workload required to achieve the development and unit tests;
  • Appropriating the operating rules of the development environment;
  • Code/set-up and document what is produced;
  • Comply with the standards and procedures (architecture, security, quality, documentation);
  • Perform a reporting activity (Daily Scrum) on the product or integrated component;
  • Working with Continuous Delivery and Agile methodologies (Scrumban / Kanban);
  • Define the unit test cases for the product component;
  • Ensure compliance with technical specifications;
  • Conduct performance tests: Test Driven Development, BDDs & DDD;
  • Contribute to the 3rd level support, this includes: monitoring of the resolution of incident and troubleshooting.

What our new colleague should have:

  • Excellent understanding of Java 8+ and Hibernate;
  • Excellent understanding of Angular 2+;
  • Experience with batch jobs (Spring Batch), Spring Boot;
  • Proficiency in English and German;
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent (HTL).

If you want to accept this challenge, apply now.

Why us?

  • Be part of an international, multicultural environment of 7,750 talented people over 60 countries and 5 continents
  • Join a fast-growing global group with a turnover of €565M and over 1,000 clients across the world
  • Explore opportunities to grow quickly with a tailor-made career path: 70% of our key senior talent joined the company at entry level
  • Take advantage of over 500 training courses in our ACADEMY catalogue, which includes programs in interpersonal communication, team management, project management, etc.
  • Get the opportunity to support nonprofit organizations thanks to our Foundation initiatives and volunteering platform OneSmallStep
  • Depending on your performance and eligibility criteria, you can benefit from international mobility opportunities and progress your career worldwide, and/or experience other departments and sectors
  • Unlock your full potential, both professionally and personally.
